info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 12 at 12:51PM EST until March 12 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Total snow accumulation of 5 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Montgomery, Fulton, and Southern Herkimer Counties. * WHEN...Through 10 PM EST tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult due to snow covered roadways and low visibility. Gusty winds will cause blowing and drifting of snowfall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates of around an inch per hour at times early this afternoon.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
